functions.label: getSpaceColor
description:
Determines the color for the provided space.
If a color is present on the Space itself, then that is used.
Otherwise, a color is provided from EUI's Visualization Colors based on the space name.

children.label: space
description: the space.

functions.label: getSpaceImageUrl
description: Determines the avatar image for the provided space.

children.label: space
description: the space.

functions.label: getSpaceInitials
description:
Determines the initials for the provided space.
If initials are present on the Space itself, then that is used.
Otherwise, the initials are calculated based off the words in the space name, with a max length of 2 characters.

children.label: space
description: the space.

interfaces.label: GetSpaceResult
description: Response format when querying for spaces.

children.label: authorizedPurposes
description: A set of flags indicating which purposes the user is authorized for.

interfaces.label: Space
description: A Kibana Space.

children.label: id
description:
The unique identifier for this space.
The id becomes part of the "URL Identifier" of the space.

Example: an id of `marketing` would result in the URL identifier of `/s/marketing`.

children.label: name
description: Display name for this space.

children.label: description
description: Optional description for this space.

children.label: color
description:
Optional color (hex code) for this space.
If neither `color` nor `imageUrl` is specified, then a color will be automatically generated.

children.label: initials
description:
Optional display initials for this space's avatar. Supports a maximum of 2 characters.
If initials are not provided, then they will be derived from the space name automatically.

Initials are not displayed if an `imageUrl` has been specified.

children.label: imageUrl
description:
Optional base-64 encoded data image url to show as this space's avatar.
This setting takes precedence over any configured `color` or `initials`.

children.label: disabledFeatures
description: The set of feature ids that should be hidden within this space.

children.label: _reserved
description:
Indicates that this space is reserved (system controlled).
Reserved spaces cannot be created or deleted by end-users.

misc.label: GetAllSpacesPurpose
description:
The set of purposes to retrieve spaces:
- `any`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to see.
- `copySavedObjectsIntoSpace`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to copy saved objects into.
- `findSavedObjects`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to search within.
- `shareSavedObjectsIntoSpace`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to share saved objects into.

setup.label: SpacesPluginSetup
description: Setup contract for the Spaces plugin.

start.label: SpacesPluginStart
description: Start contract for the Spaces plugin.

functions.label: addSpaceIdToPath
signature: (basePath: string, spaceId: string, requestedPath: string) => string
description:
Given a server base path, space id, and requested resource, this will construct a space-aware path
that includes a URL identifier with the space id.

children.label: basePath
description: the server's base path.

children.label: spaceId
description: the space id.

children.label: requestedPath
description: the requested path (e.g. `/app/dashboard`).

returnComment: the space-aware version of the requested path, inclusive of the server's base path.

interfaces.label: GetAllSpacesOptions
description: Controls how spaces are retrieved.

children.label: purpose
description:
An optional purpose describing how the set of spaces will be used.
The default purpose (`any`) will retrieve all spaces the user is authorized to see,
whereas a more specific purpose will retrieve all spaces the user is authorized to perform a specific action within.

children.label: includeAuthorizedPurposes
description: Set to true to return a set of flags indicating which purposes the user is authorized for.

interfaces.label: GetSpaceResult
description: Response format when querying for spaces.

children.label: authorizedPurposes
description: A set of flags indicating which purposes the user is authorized for.

interfaces.label: ISpacesClient
description: Client interface for interacting with spaces.

children.label: getAll
description: Retrieve all available spaces.

children.label: options
description: controls which spaces are retrieved.

children.label: get
description: Retrieve a space by its id.

children.label: id
description: the space id.

children.label: create
description: Creates a space.

children.label: space
description: the space to create.

children.label: update
description: Updates a space.

children.label: id
description: the id of the space to update.

children.label: space
description: the updated space.

children.label: delete
description: Deletes a space, and all saved objects belonging to that space.

children.label: id
description: the id of the space to delete.

interfaces.label: Space
description: A Kibana Space.

children.label: id
description:
The unique identifier for this space.
The id becomes part of the "URL Identifier" of the space.

Example: an id of `marketing` would result in the URL identifier of `/s/marketing`.

description: Display name for this space.

children.label: color

If neither `color` nor `imageUrl` is specified, then a color will be automatically generated.

children.label: initials

If initials are not provided, then they will be derived from the space name automatically.

Initials are not displayed if an `imageUrl` has been specified.

children.label: imageUrl
description:
Optional base-64 encoded data image url to show as this space's avatar.
This setting takes precedence over any configured `color` or `initials`.

Indicates that this space is reserved (system controlled).

misc.label: GetAllSpacesPurpose
description:
The set of purposes to retrieve spaces:
- `any`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to see.
- `copySavedObjectsIntoSpace`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to copy saved objects into.
- `findSavedObjects`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to search within.
- `shareSavedObjectsIntoSpace`: retrieves all spaces the user is authorized to share saved objects into.
